attributes.action: Give the public more vote on what our military action with terrorism involves
attributes.additional_details: allowing the public to vote for/against military action will assist parliament with the majority decision and backing from the public will support a wider array of operations carried out world wide.
attributes.background: In recent events our European Union is being damaged by terrorist groups (IS) filtering through European borders. They filtered in through mass immigration. Giving the public more vote on action to prevent and reduce terrorism will raise ideas not previously issued by parliament as solutions
